# Java2D sketch warnings with jdk12, JRuby-9.2.8.0 and JRubyArt-2.2.0

## sketch

```ruby
def settings
  size 200, 200
end

def setup
  sketch_title 'Simple'
end

def draw

end
```

## java_args

```bash
--illegal-access=warn
```
